page.title: 08THE BUTCHER IN ABERNYTE
page.content: The travelling Butcher who comes to most parts of our area on Tuesdays and Fridays is called Joe.He is very friendly and drives a van for Scott Brothers of Dundee.In his van he has a chopping board,fridge and cold cabinet.He cuts the amount of meat that people ask for from large joints. When he arrives he toots his horn so everybody knows he's there.You can only get about four people in his van at once because the counter goes right across the middle of the van.The door that you enter is the passengers side. Joe sells all kinds of butcher meat like bacon,beef,lamb,mince and pork. When he has some spare bones he gives them to the people that have dogs. He does not do as much trade as he used to do since many people have freezers or buy their meat in the town.The most popular sale is mince.
